title: Treasury 30-Year Yield Slides as Investors Seek Out Havens
description: A rise in US Treasuries pushed the 30-year bond’s yield to the lowest level so far this year amid haven demand and bond supply considerations.
content: A rise in US Treasuries pushed the 30-year bond’s yield to the lowest level so far this year amid haven demand and bond supply considerations.
